body_html: Oh no, this one is breaking Windows build. Is there any way we can generate NativeFunctions.h before the build of NativeFunctionsCuda.cu? I tried ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET , SET NativeFunctions.h PROPERTY GENERATED TRUE and ADD_DEPENDENCY, but no one worked here.
body_text: Oh no, this one is breaking Windows build. Is there any way we can generate NativeFunctions.h before the build of NativeFunctionsCuda.cu? I tried ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET , SET NativeFunctions.h PROPERTY GENERATED TRUE and ADD_DEPENDENCY, but no one worked here.
body: Oh no, this one is breaking Windows build. Is there any way we can generate `NativeFunctions.h` before the build of `NativeFunctionsCuda.cu`? I tried `ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET` , `SET NativeFunctions.h PROPERTY GENERATED TRUE` and `ADD_DEPENDENCY`, but no one worked here.
